author: brane
msg: When sending the status mail, generate the common headers only
once; add a MIME-Version header to error mails; and make sure
the final MIME part boundary is always present.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix bug that caused tests to fail introduced in r9965.

author: brane
msg: Fix a few more nits in the test scripts.
'==' operator, and enclose strings in quotes in conditionals.
parameter (this is already used at least in two of the installations).
of explicit "rev " in notification mail subjects.

author: brane
msg: Enable automated testing of the FSFS backend and fix a couple of
* tools/test-scripts/svntest/svntest.sh: Add empty RA and FS type
arguments in calls to svntest-sendmail.sh wherever they aren't
known. This fixes a bug with sending mail when the update failed.
Duplicate every existing test run for both BDB and FSFS.
the subject line of notification e-mails. Also, don't attach the
tests.log.gz file to the failure mail if it doesn't exist. This
fixes a bug that would send an empty attachment on failure mails.

author: rey4
msg: Minor make generator changes: remove sorting voodoo from gen_base.py,
instead just sort dependencies before outputting them. Also remove
extra whitespace from project files introduced in r9935. These changes
affect the order of dependencies and whitespace in the generated
makefiles and project files, but leave them the same otherwise.
add special case for TargetJava and TargetI18N
